mapper.select: select gCode, gCategory, gName, gPrice, gImage, gCountry, gCompany, gDate from goods
mapper.update: update goods set gCode = #{gCode}, gCategory = #{gCategory}, gName = #{gName}, gPrice = #{gPrice}, gImage = #{gImage}, gCountry = #{gCountry}, gCompany = #{gCompany}, gDate = #{gDate}, gAmount = #{gAmount} where gCode=#{gCode}
mapper.insert: insert into goods(gCode, gCategory, gName, gPrice, gImage, gCountry, gCompany, gDate, gAmount) values (#{gCode},#{gCategory},#{gName},#{gPrice},#{gImage},#{gCountry},#{gCompany},#{gDate},null)
